title: Enhancing Efficiency and Productivity: IoT in Industrial Manufacturing
abstract: This in-depth investigation digs at the introduction of Internet of Things (IoT) technology into industrial production processes, with the goal of increasing operational efficiency and overall productivity. The study delves into various applications, challenges, and advancements in IoT implementation within the industrial sector. Through a detailed analysis of relevant literature, this review provides valuable insights into the strategies, technologies, and best practices adopted by businesses to optimize their manufacturing operations. Crucial focal points encompass IoT-facilitated automation, continuous monitoring, anticipatory maintenance, streamlining the supply chain, and the analysis of data. The review also examines the impact of IoT on energy management, cost reduction, and environmental sustainability. By synthesizing existing research, this article comprehensive perspective on the benefits and limitations of IoT adoption in industrial manufacturing, providing a foundation for future research and practical implementations.
